--- id: raven-guard-space-marine title: Space Marine – Raven Guard name: Raven Guard Space Marine introduction: | forces: - raven-guard - imperial-navy - titan-legion using_the_army_list: | The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Raven Guard or one of their successor chapters using their preferred operational methods. Space Marines are organised into small formations called _detachments_. Each detachment is made up of one or more units, and may also include a number of extra units called _upgrades_. The detachments that may be taken in a Raven Guard army are shown on the chart that follows. The chart also shows what units comprise the detachment, what upgrades are allowed, and its points cost. For example, an Assault detachment consists of four Space Marine Assault units for 175 points, and may include the Commander and Vindicator upgrades at an additional cost in points. Each upgrade that is taken adds to the cost of the detachment, as shown on the _upgrade chart_. The upgrade chart also lists the units that make up the upgrade. Note that these will sometimes replace units in the detachment they are taken for, and sometimes takes the form of additional units for the detachment. Each upgrade may be taken once per formation. For example, an Assault detachment could include one Commander and one Vindicator. If both were taken it would cost 175 + 50 +75 = 300 points. Raven Guard armies may be supported by Imperial Navy aircraft and Titan Legion battlegroups. A maximum of up to a third of the points available to the army may be spent on these formations. special_rules_text: | The _They Shall Know No Fear_ rule applies to all Raven Guard formations (see [_They Shall Know No Fear_](#they-shall-know-no-fear)). special_rules: - raven-guard-transport ---

Raven Guard Space Marine armies have a strategy rating of 5. Imperial Navy aircraft formations have an initiative rating of 2+. All other formations have an initiative rating of 1+.

Raven Guard Detachments
Formation Units Upgrades Cost
Assault Four Assault units Commander, Land Speeders 175 points
Land Speeder Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado Commander, Planetfall, Tempests, Typhoons 200 points
Landing Craft One Landing Craft None 350 points
Scout Four Scout units Commander, Land Speeders, Land Speeder Storms, Scouts, Snipers 150 points
0–1 Strike Cruiser One Strike Cruiser Battle Barge 200 points
Tactical Six Tactical units plus transport Caestus, Commander, Dreadnoughts, Hunter, Land Speeders, Razorbacks 275 points
Tactical Assault Six Tactical Assault units plus transport Caestus, Commander, Dreadnoughts, Hunter, Land Speeders, Razorbacks 225 points
Terminator Four Terminator units Caestus, Commander, Dreadnoughts 350 points
Thunderhawk One Thunderhawk Gunship None 200 points
Vanguard Veteran Four Vanguard Veteran units plus transport Caestus, Commander, Land Speeders, Razorbacks 200 points
Raven Guard Upgrades
(Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment.)
Upgrade Units Cost
Battle Barge Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge +150 points
Caestus Add any number of Caestus, up to the number required to transport the formation +50 points each
Commander Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation: Captain, Chaplain, Librarian +50 points
0–1 Supreme Commander per army +100 points
Dreadnoughts Add up to two Dreadnoughts +50 points each
Hunter Add one Hunter +75 points
Land Speeders Choose one of the following: Add any two of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado +75 points
Add two Land Speeder Typhoons +100 points
Add two Land Speeder Tempests +150 points
Land Speeder Storms Add enough Land Speeder Storms to transport the entire formation +25 points each
Planetfall Give all units in the formation Planetfall +25 points
Razorbacks Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation +25 points each
Scouts Add two Scout units +75 points
Snipers Give up to two Scout units Sniper +25 points
Give up to four Scout units Sniper +50 points
Tempests Replace any number of Land Speeders in the formation with an equal number of Land Speeder Tempests +35 points each
Typhoons Replace up to two Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons +25 points
Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons +50 points
Imperial Ally Formations
(Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.)
Imperial Navy Aircraft
Formation Units Cost
Marauder Squadron Two Marauder Bombers 250 points
Thunderbolt Squadron Two Thunderbolt Fighters 175 points
Titan Legion Battlegroups
Formation Units Cost
Warhound One Warhound Class Titan 275 points
Warhound Pack Two Warhound Class Titans 500 points
